properties.description: Parameters of the shape recognition if in use.

name: RecognitionParameters
description: Parameters to be used for recognition

properties.name: type
properties.description: Recognition type (TEXT, MATH, SHAPE, MUSIC, ANALYZER).

properties.name: protocol
properties.description: REST or WEBSOCKET to choose the API to use.

properties.name: apiVersion
properties.description: Version of the api to use.

properties.name: v3
properties.description: Parameters of the recognition api v3.

properties.name: v4
properties.description: Parameters of the recognition api v4.

properties.name: undoRedoMaxStackSize
properties.description: Number of strokes keep in undo redo stack.

properties.name: xyFloatPrecision
properties.description: Precision of x and y from 0 to 10 (integer). More the value is high more precise will be the point capture but object in memory and send to the server will be heavier.

properties.name: resizeTriggerDelay
properties.description: Quiet period to wait before triggering resize (in ms).

name: src/configuration/DefaultStyles.js
src/configuration/LoggerConfig.js
src/grabber/PointerEventGrabber.js
Grabber
description: Grab pointerDown, pointerMove and pointerUp events

properties.name: attachEvents
properties.description: Attach events and decide when to call editor pointerDown/Move/Up methods

params.name: element
params.description: DOM element to attach events listeners

listens.description: pointermove: a pointer moves, similar to touchmove or mousemove.
pointerdown: a pointer is activated, or a device button held.
pointerup: a pointer is deactivated, or a device button released.
pointerover: a pointer has moved onto an element.
pointerout: a pointer is no longer on an element it once was.
pointerenter: a pointer enters the bounding box of an element.
pointerleave: a pointer leaves the bounding box of an element.
pointercancel: a pointer will no longer generate events.

properties.name: lastSentPosition
properties.description: Index of the last sent stroke.

properties.name: lastReceivedPosition
properties.description: Index of the last received stroke.

properties.name: exports
properties.description: The exports output as return by the recognition service.

properties.name: state
properties.description: Current state of the model. Mainly here for debugging purpose.

properties.name: defaultSymbols
properties.description: Default symbols, relative to the current recognition type.

properties.name: recognizedSymbols
properties.description: Symbols to render (e.g. stroke, shape primitives, string, characters...).

properties.name: exports
properties.description: Result of the export (e.g. mathml, latex, text...).

properties.name: rawResults
properties.description: The recognition output as return by the recognition service.

params.name: configuration
params.description: Parameters to use to populate default recognition symbols

name: needRedraw
description: Check if the model needs to be redrawn.

return.description: True if the model needs to be redrawn, false otherwise

name: addStroke
description: Mutate the model given in parameter by adding the new strokeToAdd.

params.name: stroke
params.description: Stroke to be added to pending ones

name: extractPendingStrokes
description: Get the strokes that needs to be recognized

params.name: position
params.description: Index from where to extract strokes

name: initPendingStroke
description: Mutate the model by adding a point and close the current stroke.

params.name: point
params.description: Captured point to create current stroke

params.name: properties
params.description: Properties to be applied to the current stroke

name: appendToPendingStroke
description: Mutate the model by adding a point to the current pending stroke.

params.name: point
params.description: Captured point to be append to the current stroke

name: endPendingStroke
description: Mutate the model by adding the new point on a initPendingStroke.

params.name: point
params.description: Captured point to be append to the current stroke

name: getBorderCoordinates
description: Get the bounds of the current model.

return.description: Bounding box enclosing the current drawn model

name: extractStrokesFromInkRange
description: Extract strokes from an ink range

name: updateModelReceivedPosition
description: Update model lastReceivedPosition regarding to lastSentPosition

name: extractPendingRecognizedSymbols
description: Get the symbols that needs to be rendered

params.name: position
params.description: Index from where to extract symbols

init
description:
Init the websocket recognizer.
Open the connexion and proceed to the hmac challenge.
A recognizer context is build as such :

return.description: Fulfilled when the init phase is over.

name: reconnect
description:
Reconnect the websocket recognizer.
Open the connexion and proceed to the hmac challenge.
A recognizer context is build as such :

return.description: Fulfilled when the init phase is over.

types: ...function(recognizerContext: RecognizerContext, model: Model, configuration: Configuration): Object
params.name: buildMessages

addWebsocketAttributes
description: Attach all socket attributes helping managing server connexion

name: src/recognizer/websocket/v3/Cdkv3WSBuilder.js
buildHmac
description:
A CDK v3 websocket dialog have this sequence :
---------- Client ------------------------------------- Server ----------------------------------
init (send the applicationKey) ================>
                                      <=========== hmacChallenge
answerToHmacChallenge (send the hmac) =========>
                                      <=========== init
start (send the parameters and first strokes ) ===============>
                                      <=========== recognition with instance id
continue (send the other strokes ) ============>
                                      <=========== recognition

name: buildWebSocketCallback
description: This function bind the right behaviour when a message is receive by the websocket.

name: src/recognizer/websocket/v4/Cdkv4WSBuilder.js
buildHmac
description:
A CDK v4 websocket dialog have this sequence :
---------- Client ------------------------------------- Server ----------------------------------
init (send the new content package) ================>
                                      <=========== hmacChallenge
answerToHmacChallenge (send the hmac) =========>
newPart (send the parameters ) ===============>
                                      <=========== update
addStrokes (send the strokes ) ============>
                                      <=========== update

name: buildWebSocketCallback
description: This function bind the right behaviour when a message is receive by the websocket.
